var t = async_test("ImageData.data converts undefined to 0");
_addTest(function(canvas, ctx) {

  var imgdata = ctx.getImageData(0, 0, 10, 10);
  imgdata.data[0] = 100;
  imgdata.data[0] = undefined;
  _assertSame(imgdata.data[0], 0, "imgdata.data[\""+(0)+"\"]", "0");

});
</script>
